**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 189 2.0 **Price** 24,000 gp **Usage** worn belt **Bulk** 1 --- The thin, glittering strands of rope that comprise this thick belt appear to be spun gold. Strung along the front of the belt are a collection of four multicolored, perfectly spherical beads: jade, turquoise, quartz, and amethyst. While wearing the lash, you gain a +3 item bonus to [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13). When you invest the belt, you either increase your Wisdom score by 2 or to 18, whichever would give you a higher score. **Activate** command, Interact; **Effect** You touch one of the jewels affixed to the sage's lash and speak a command word. Depending on the jewel, a different effect is produced that affects you and all living creatures in a 30-foot emanation. After the effect occurs, all four jewels disappear from the lash, reappearing at the next dawn.
  • **Jade** ([healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128)) Speak “purity” to produce a wave of green light that ends any [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) condition and any [ongoing poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) affecting creatures in the emanation.
  • **Turquoise** Speak “clarity” to grant all affected a +2 status bonus to their next Will save for 1 minute.
  • **Quartz** ([healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128)) Speak “lenity” to have each creature regain 30 Hit Points.
  • **Amethyst** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100), [revelation](/Traits.aspx?ID=138)) Speak “verity” to emit a magical trail of light from the lash that reveals the location of each creature in the emanation. For 1 round, if they would be [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), they become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) instead, and if they would be [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) or [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=41) by a creature, they're [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) instead. A creature can attempt a DC 43 [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check to avoid the lash's detection.
name: Sage's Lash
